channel.title: Keith the SQL guru
channel.description:
No fooling him...
(02:22) Keith: What would the right query be? I'm doing Select FROM rsca2_players where login_ip = "217.159.239.46" UPDATE banned = "1" (02:23) Luke: UPDATE `rsca2_players` SET `banned` = 1 WHERE `login_ip` = '217.159.239.46' OR `creation_ip` = '217.159.239.46' (02:23) Keith: Oh alright I'll try that (02:23) Keith: Thanks (02:23) Luke: yours should work too though (02:23) Keith: Wasn't working though for some reason was getting an error (02:23) Keith: Ill try yours (02:23) Luke: weird, normally you can just tell mysql to do whatever you want and it understands, it's like a human (02:24) Keith: Ah I see, yours worked to (02:27) Luke: to save DB space you should just delete all his chars from that IP... you want me to give you the query? (02:27) Keith: Yeah (02:29) Luke: DELETE FROM `rsca2_players` WHERE `login_ip` = '217.159.239.46' OR `creation_ip` != '217.159.239.46'; (02:29) Keith: Alright (02:29) Keith: or 'creation_ip != (02:29) lol. (02:30) Keith: Trying to get me to delete everyone Mr Luke (02:30) Luke: rofl, wudda been funny (02:31) Keith: Right when you were giving me query's I made a backup (02:31) just incase if I didnt look at it (02:31) lol (02:31) Luke: plz dont post it on mopar tho (02:31) Keith: I'm not (02:31) Luke: kk thx (02:32) Keith: I'll be back later cya

item.title: Keith the SQL guru
item.dc:creator: @NoLives NoLives
item.description:
@NoLives wrote:

[quote=“The_AFKer, post:10, topic:395593”][quote author=5 1 link=topic=492787.msg3602978#msg3602978 date=1305781801]

cmon why post this…

Keith is a fucking dipshit, this was established months ago

You’re just mad for some reason.

Just because I made fun of you, it doesn’t make me mad…

Starting to think you’re the_afker aka void

aww someone’s still hurt from earlier… counseling is a good solution, or in your case SWITCH TO DARKQUEST!!11111

You just think people are mad when they really aren’t. Maybe we can be like “PMG I GOT TO LEAVE GUYS LUKE KNOWS IM DEVELOPING HERE FFS OMGGGG POMP WHO TOLD HIM SERIOUSLY?Y?Y?!?!?!”

P.S: Nothing you did fixed the exploit.
[/quote]

LOL you realize that was a joke right? It looks like you’re trying too hard now

Try being more original with comebacks instead of copying my responses like you did on IRC. If you want to bitch more garbage, save it for IRC, clearly no one here cares.

EDIT: Here i’ll do you one better so we can at least entertain the crowd.

Honestly this is what I imagine you’re like everyday…

[/quote]You actually took your time lol.

Read full topic
